title: Tuk Tuk
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian street food style restaurant with several vegetarian items of which some can be requestedh. Has dhal, chickpeas, pakoras, and a potato fritter burger to name a few.  The menu is accessible and the street food atmosphere encourages ordering several of the dishes which come in smaller portions in separate pans and bowls.
